id.description: Unique identifier for the object. Represented as the three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html) in lowercase.

object.description: String representing the object's type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

rates.description: Hash where the keys are supported currencies and the values are the exchange rate at which the base id currency converts to the key currency.
